% Sans-serif options (ATS-friendly)
\newcommand{\useFiraSans}{\resetFont{}\usepackage[sfdefault]{FiraSans}}         % Modern, clean
\newcommand{\useRoboto}{\resetFont{}\usepackage[sfdefault]{roboto}}             % Android-friendly
\newcommand{\useNotoSans}{\resetFont{}\usepackage[sfdefault]{noto-sans}}        % Google standard
\newcommand{\useSourceSansPro}{\resetFont{}\usepackage[default]{sourcesanspro}} % Adobe free font
\newcommand{\useHelvetica}{\resetFont{}\usepackage{helvet}}                     % pdfLaTeX approximation of Arial
\newcommand{\useVerdana}{\resetFont{}\usepackage{arev}}                         % Approximates Verdana

% Serif options (ATS-friendly)
\newcommand{\useCormorantGaramond}{\resetFont{}\usepackage{CormorantGaramond}}  % Elegant
\newcommand{\useCharter}{\resetFont{}\usepackage{charter}}                      % Clear, formal
\newcommand{\useTimesNewRoman}{\resetFont{}\usepackage{times}}                  % Basic Times (not full Unicode)
\newcommand{\useCambria}{\resetFont{}\usepackage{tgpagella}}                    % Palatino as Cambria-like
\newcommand{\useGeorgia}{\resetFont{}\usepackage{newpxtext,newpxmath}}          % Reasonable Georgia approximation

%-------------------------
% Custom commands
\NewDocumentCommand{\resumeHeader}{m m o o o}{
    \textbf{\Huge #1} \\ \vspace{3pt}
    \vspace{4pt}
    #2
    \IfValueT{#3}{$|$ #3}
    \IfValueT{#4}{$|$ #4}
    \IfValueT{#5}{$|$ #5}
    \\[-8pt]
    \noindent\color{black}\titlerule 
    \vspace{-5pt}
}


\newcommand{\resumeItem}[1]{\item\small{#1 \vspace{-2pt}}}
\newcommand{\resumeSubheading}[4]{
  \vspace{-2pt}\item
    \begin{tabular*}{0.97\textwidth}[t]{l@{\extracolsep{\fill}}r}
      \textbf{#1} & #2 \\
      \textit{\small#3} & \textit{\small #4} \\
    \end{tabular*}\vspace{-7pt}
}

\newcommand{\resumeProjectHeading}[2]{
    \item
    \begin{tabular*}{0.97\textwidth}{l@{\extracolsep{\fill}}r}
      \small#1 & #2 \\
    \end{tabular*}\vspace{-7pt}
}

\newcommand{\resumeSubItem}[1]{\resumeItem{#1}\vspace{-4pt}}

\renewcommand\labelitemii{$\vcenter{\hbox{\tiny\textbullet}}$}

\newcommand{\resumeItemList}[1]{
  \begin{itemize}
    \foreach \x in {#1}  {
      \resumeItem{\x}
    }
  \end{itemize}\vspace{-5pt}
}

\newcommand{\sectionEntry}[5]{
    
}

\newcommand{\resumeSection}[2]{
  \section{\textbf{#1} }
    \resumeSubHeadingListStart
        #2
    \resumeSubHeadingListEnd
}

\newcommand{\resumeSkillsItem}[2]{
    \textbf{#1}{#2} \\
}

\NewDocumentCommand{\resumeSkills}{o o o o o o o o}{
  \small{\item{
    \IfValueT{#1}{\IfValueT{#2}{\resumeSkillsItem{#1}{#2}}}
    \IfValueT{#3}{\IfValueT{#4}{\resumeSkillsItem{#3}{#4}}}
    \IfValueT{#5}{\IfValueT{#6}{\resumeSkillsItem{#5}{#6}}}
    \IfValueT{#7}{\IfValueT{#8}{\resumeSkillsItem{#7}{#8}}}
  }}
}

\newcommand{\resumeSubHeadingListStart}{\begin{itemize}[leftmargin=0.15in, label={}]}
\newcommand{\resumeSubHeadingListEnd}{\end{itemize}}
\newcommand{\resumeItemListStart}{\begin{itemize}}
\newcommand{\resumeItemListEnd}{\end{itemize}\vspace{-5pt}}
